reporting.reportgraph.GraphQuery:
SET @FromDate ={%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_DateTrim(@FromDate,'{%if (Interval == null) { "year" } else { Interval }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)2bf4aa383d85308049c5e9b38316b4c9c54429899ed390a7bf5e30be723f57b1%}');
SELECT {%if (Columns == null) { "Date" } else { Columns }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)d789b5be9c7237d8e1072ffb879435e581fb6ffa34d07a93785265c31592ae2f%} AS StartTime , T1.Hits AS Time FROM {%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_EnsureDates (@FromDate,@ToDate,'{%if (Interval == null) { "year" } else { Interval }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)2bf4aa383d85308049c5e9b38316b4c9c54429899ed390a7bf5e30be723f57b1%}') AS Dates LEFT JOIN (SELECT HitsStartTime AS StartTime, SUM(HitsValue) / SUM(HitsCount) AS hits FROM Analytics_Statistics INNER JOIN {%if (AnalyticsTable == null) { "Analytics_YearHits" } else { AnalyticsTable }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)61cbe401f518a3cd45474d7a540fc7c67a96863c30050952f3792af0fc40e531%} ON {%if (AnalyticsTable == null) { "Analytics_YearHits" } else { AnalyticsTable }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)61cbe401f518a3cd45474d7a540fc7c67a96863c30050952f3792af0fc40e531%}.HitsStatisticsID = Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsID WHERE (StatisticsSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID) AND (StatisticsCode = 'avgtimeonpage') AND StatisticsObjectID = @NodeID AND StatisticsObjectCulture = @CultureCode GROUP BY HitsStartTime) AS T1 ON T1.StartTime = [Date]
